item.title: ## Rhythm TDD Development Notes and Ben's Command Block Setup
item.description: Rhythm TDD Development Notes and Ben’s Command Block Setup Rollbar Integration for Rhythm Foot Control Pad for Computer [Drawing description: A simple blue sketch showing what appears to be an L-shaped foot control pad or pedal] Rhythm TDD Checklist: System Playlists ■ Search/Playlist = yet-driven Client Authentication AdSee System Test Server [ ] Test Client Client: Finish Designs ■ Client: Can Resume spot on app boot ■ Coming Soon: can make playlists ■ Client: iOS ■ Bottom Nav Bar (spacing iOS) Ensure autoplay works (80?
item.content:
Rhythm TDD Development Notes and Ben’s Command Block Setup

Rollbar Integration for Rhythm

Foot Control Pad for Computer

[Drawing description: A simple blue sketch showing what appears to be an L-shaped foot control pad or pedal]

Rhythm TDD Checklist:

  • System Playlists
  • ■ Search/Playlist = yet-driven
  • Client Authentication
  • AdSee System
    • Test Server [ ] Test Client
  • Client: Finish Designs
  • ■ Client: Can Resume spot on app boot
  • ■ Coming Soon: can make playlists
  • ■ Client: iOS
  • ■ Bottom Nav Bar (spacing iOS)
  • Ensure autoplay works (80?)
  • ■ Search playlist screen
  • ■ Queue → Page: keep playing

Allow Ben to use Cmd Block:

  • get X(64 Diamonds
  • Pwns Flick diamond Blue
  • if you aren’t Ben; death!

item.title: ## Mobile App Development Notes & Cost Calculations
item.description: Mobile App Development Notes & Cost Calculations Triple Dot - acq. App.com - REPLICATION CPI $36K/month = bills $100K/day = Licensing ☐ Cache video, queue, CURRENT HYPE ☐ Reload on app start ☐ Coming Soon Location Changes (No Playback) [There is a scribbled/crossed out section with heavy blue marks] SDK Integration: Amplitude SDK AppFlyer Facebook Ads SDK Cost Calculation: $15,000/day × 30 = $0,000 √ 5,000 $450,000 Organic Growth: 1700 organic 2700 organic in our system Diagram Description: The note contains several organizational elements including checkboxes for task tracking, crossed-out items indicating completed or cancelled features, and a mathematical calculation showing monthly revenue projections.
item.content:
Mobile App Development Notes & Cost Calculations

Triple Dot - acq. App.com - REPLICATION

CPI

  • $36K/month = bills
  • $100K/day = Licensing

☐ Cache video, queue, CURRENT HYPE ☐ Reload on app start

☐ Coming Soon Location Changes (No Playback)

[There is a scribbled/crossed out section with heavy blue marks]

SDK Integration:

  • Amplitude SDK
  • AppFlyer
  • Facebook Ads SDK

Cost Calculation: $15,000/day × 30 = $0,000 √ 5,000 $450,000

Organic Growth:

  • 1700 organic
  • 2700 organic in our system

Diagram Description: The note contains several organizational elements including checkboxes for task tracking, crossed-out items indicating completed or cancelled features, and a mathematical calculation showing monthly revenue projections. There’s a heavily scribbled section that appears to represent frustration or emphasis around the “No Playback” issue.

item.title: ## Smart Home Server and IoT Setup Notes
item.description: Smart Home Server and IoT Setup Notes System Architecture Smart Home Server Linux – systemd startup script Windows – startup PS1 script Both connect to: Docker Container w/ MQTT Broker Diagram: Simple flow chart showing Linux and Windows boxes connecting via dotted lines to the Docker container Embedded MQTT Broker in a Mist Program, w/ Client pub/sub Diagram: Small squares and rectangles representing “Couldn’s game of life Roguerl” - appears to be a simple sketch of connected components
item.content:
Smart Home Server and IoT Setup Notes

System Architecture

Smart Home Server

  • Linux – systemd startup script
  • Windows – startup PS1 script

Both connect to: Docker Container w/ MQTT Broker

Diagram: Simple flow chart showing Linux and Windows boxes connecting via dotted lines to the Docker container

Embedded MQTT Broker in a Mist Program, w/ Client pub/sub

Diagram: Small squares and rectangles representing “Couldn’s game of life Roguerl” - appears to be a simple sketch of connected components

Date: 2025-02-15

Recent Updates

■ Upload 2.3.14 Android/iOS

  • Include 2.0.2 Flutter/Earn SDK update
  • integrate Shuffle to each of test tracks
  • [unclear] outage

■ Program YouTube Search [struck through]

□ Sketch CofE Go 2

  • Hiring Trainees (Unity) - iOS Organic - Playful Left ~ 100k online
  • table in January

Status Questions

Are these scraped?

  • Linkin Park
  • Lower Dingle Nope! - Meaning poor search results is due to it being not scraped yet

Note: This appears to be technical notes about a smart home server setup with MQTT messaging, along with mobile app development updates and content scraping status checks.

item.title: ## Product Development & Playful Rewards Notes
item.description: Product Development & Playful Rewards Notes Date: 2024-10-22 Prepared by: Default Diagram: Push Out RTK Client Build Process [Diamond-shaped diagram showing “Push Out RTK DEN Logs one Client” workflow with staging and client builds + Firebase] Playful Rewards: Test Attribution Push Up Social Auth (Staging + Client Builds + Firebase) App Usage Tracking Sync w/ Adam: 2.3.4 • What are our goals exactly • Here is what we provide summary Send Adam Credentials encrypt changes for [Lead Accar-auth] Onboarding Wizard v2 (Quick vs Big) V2.
item.content:
Product Development & Playful Rewards Notes

Date: 2024-10-22
Prepared by: Default

Diagram: Push Out RTK Client Build Process

[Diamond-shaped diagram showing “Push Out RTK DEN Logs one Client” workflow with staging and client builds + Firebase]

Playful Rewards:

Test Attribution

  • Push Up Social Auth (Staging + Client Builds + Firebase)
  • App Usage Tracking Sync w/ Adam: 2.3.4
    • • What are our goals exactly
    • • Here is what we provide summary
  • Send Adam Credentials encrypt changes for [Lead Accar-auth]
  • Onboarding Wizard v2 (Quick vs Big)

V2.3.4 Updates

  • Filter Out Recently Played (90-days) ⭐

UserWise Updates

  • Mongo 5 → 6
    • • Staging: 0 Production
  • Parietal Changes >_<
  • FluxRTS during?
  • Global Rewrite config
  • Worker Job (time)?
  • Push Notifications (Scheduled Send)

OUG [boxed text]

Perpetual Call Notes:

Q1/Q2 for LiveOps; UW then?

  • GCP??? Do we host for them?
  • How do we integrate UW ↔ PT
    • • UW would be a nice frontend
    • • They would need custom features
  • Start SaaS → Self-Hosted (pre-live)

PubSub Realtime Flow

  • They provide segments to us.

ECP [boxed text at bottom]

Diagrams Present:

  1. Diamond workflow diagram at top showing RTK client build process
  2. Star symbol (⭐) marking completed recently played filter
  3. Boxed labels for “OUG” and “ECP” sections

item.title: ## Meeting Notes - June 2, 2025
item.description: Meeting Notes - June 2, 2025 Decisions: ☑️ Remove (cough, powder, cough_sub) idx (on favor of ophicopy) ☑️ Deploy to staging → following ☑️ Test in staging ☑️ Deploy to production Kiwi: “Tap to copy” should probably be pressable Add zip share button (location share) Level up pre-entry Update app icon Boxed Notes Section: Cashapp offer What do we do if we can’t get Fund to raise Caps. $600k gross pact $160k playful share after base pay AppLaRn internally - Ad creation [unclear] -cool hire a PP Tax Additional Boxed Notes: -Intelligence Renderbook → ATD → Obsidian Personal ship Op: transparency Diagram Description: The image contains two rectangular boxes with handwritten notes inside them.

item.title: ## Appuser Effect System Design
item.description: Appuser Effect System Design Appuser Effect Structure Appuser Effect / \ Appuser Effect Component Details Appusers: Jobs :: Archive - delete records (Appuser Effect) Appusers: AppuserSpecial offers :: {Claim, process} - both offer examples of AppuserEffect creation AppuserEffects: Jobs :: Complete - make appuser effects w/ complete Player: Appusers :: Advice :: Cease Reward - shows usage of Appuser Effect + Effect to cease bonus rewards Effect should be Rewardable Sub Earn Sources Fluent Prestige offers Prestige Magic Receipts Prestige Sundays Rayli Meshbird / Bestios Kaiser Process Flow POST (send code) → Find or Create Idle 24-hour Effect → Find or Create Appuser Archive Effect ⬛
item.content:
Appuser Effect System Design

Appuser Effect Structure

Appuser Effect
/ \
Appuser Effect

Component Details

Appusers: Jobs :: Archive - delete records (Appuser Effect)

Appusers: AppuserSpecial offers :: {Claim, process} - both offer examples of AppuserEffect creation

AppuserEffects: Jobs :: Complete - make appuser effects w/ complete

Player: Appusers :: Advice :: Cease Reward - shows usage of Appuser Effect + Effect to cease bonus rewards

  • Effect should be Rewardable Sub

Earn Sources

  • Fluent
  • Prestige offers
  • Prestige Magic Receipts
  • Prestige Sundays
  • Rayli
  • Meshbird / Bestios
  • Kaiser

Process Flow

POST (send code) → Find or Create Idle 24-hour Effect → Find or Create Appuser Archive Effect ⬛

Receive Earn Source Event → Appusers :: AppuserEffects :: Apply Earn Modifiers ⬛ (Reward, appuser)

BOOSTED Add another 1400 reward record

Diagrams Present:

  1. Tree Structure: Shows Appuser Effect branching into Appuser and Effect components
  2. Flow Diagram: Shows POST request flow with arrows connecting the process steps
  3. Checkboxes: Multiple unchecked boxes for earn sources, with Rayli and Meshbird/Bestios crossed out
  4. Black squares (⬛): Used as completion markers or emphasis points in the flow

The notes appear to be technical documentation for a system that handles user rewards and effects, with various processes for creating, managing, and applying these effects based on different earn sources and user actions.

item.title: ## Appuser Effect System Design Notes
item.description: Appuser Effect System Design Notes Appuser Effect Structure Appuser Effect / \ Appuser Effect Key Components: Appusers: Jobs/Archive - series records (Appuser Effect) Appusers: AppuserSpecial offers: {Claim, process} - both offer examples of AppuserEffect creation AppuserEffects: Jobs: Complex mode appuser effects w/ complete Player: Appusers: Advice: CreateReward shows usage of Appuser Effect + Effect so create bonus rewards Effect should be RewardableSub Earn Sources Fluent Prestige offers Prestige Magic Receipts Prestige Surveys Rav1 MoshMod/Besitos Kwiser Process Flow Diagram POST Find or Create Find or Create (send code) → Idle 24-hour → appuser archive Effect Effect \- - - - / Event Handling Receive Earn Source → Appusers: AppuserEffects: Apply Earn Modifiers Event (Reward/appuser) | [BOOSTED] | Add another 40% Reward Record Diagrams Present:
item.content:
Appuser Effect System Design Notes

Appuser Effect Structure

Appuser Effect
/ \
Appuser Effect

Key Components:

  • Appusers: Jobs/Archive - series records (Appuser Effect)
  • Appusers: AppuserSpecial offers: {Claim, process} - both offer examples of AppuserEffect creation
  • AppuserEffects: Jobs: Complex mode appuser effects w/ complete
  • Player: Appusers: Advice: CreateReward shows usage of Appuser Effect + Effect so create bonus rewards
    • Effect should be RewardableSub

Earn Sources

  • Fluent
  • Prestige offers
  • Prestige Magic Receipts
  • Prestige Surveys
  • Rav1
  • MoshMod/Besitos
  • Kwiser

Process Flow Diagram

POST Find or Create Find or Create
(send code) → Idle 24-hour → appuser archive
Effect Effect
\- - - - /

Event Handling

Receive Earn Source → Appusers: AppuserEffects: Apply Earn Modifiers
Event (Reward/appuser)
|
[BOOSTED]
|
Add another
40% Reward
Record

Diagrams Present:

  1. A simple tree structure showing Appuser Effect branching into Appuser and Effect
  2. A linear flow diagram showing the POST request process through idle effects to archive effects
  3. An event flow diagram showing how earn source events are processed through appuser effects with boosting capabilities

The notes appear to be technical documentation for a rewards/earning system with complex effect processing and user reward mechanisms.

There’s a prominent box at the top right highlighting “TikTok + FB + Apps Hype” as an important feature area. The layout suggests this is a product planning session with various features in different stages of completion.

item.title: ## App Development & LED Strip Simulator Design
item.description: App Development & LED Strip Simulator Design System Architecture CPAM → Computer/Server MQS → Property [unclear] → LED Strip (485 SOC) 5v External power connection AllOz speed run [unclear calculations with 10x12 dimensions] EVEUS (LED Strip Simulator) Hardware Requirements: More handwriting D.C → upload Tags Software Components: Interval = “daily” / “hourly” Package name = "" AppPlayTime Scheduling Workers AppPlayTimeScheduleWorker AppPlayTimeTrackingWorker Scheduled Worker Configuration Schedule Worker (run every hour) Pull tracking worker scheduling/config If config interval changed → Cancel unqueue work Enqueue magic work AppPlayTimeTrackingWorker Every ⚫ minutes (run @ interval config) Only query for this every 8+ days Data Flow & Worker Management Shared Preferences Interval Package name Get package name interval Tracking Worker PR Remote → Get (something) If interval changed → Cancel unqueue work → Enqueue magic work Development Notes Current Status: “Hmm… Feeling good”
item.content:
App Development & LED Strip Simulator Design

System Architecture

  • CPAM → Computer/Server
  • MQS → Property [unclear] → LED Strip (485 SOC)
  • 5v External power connection
  • AllOz speed run [unclear calculations with 10x12 dimensions]

EVEUS (LED Strip Simulator)

Hardware Requirements:

  • More handwriting
  • D.C → upload
  • Tags

Software Components:

  • Interval = “daily” / “hourly”
  • Package name = ""

AppPlayTime Scheduling Workers

  • AppPlayTimeScheduleWorker
  • AppPlayTimeTrackingWorker

Scheduled Worker Configuration

Schedule Worker (run every hour)

  • Pull tracking worker scheduling/config
  • If config interval changed →
    • Cancel unqueue work
    • Enqueue magic work

AppPlayTimeTrackingWorker

  • Every ⚫ minutes (run @ interval config)
  • Only query for this every 8+ days

Data Flow & Worker Management

  • Shared Preferences
    • Interval
    • Package name
    • Get package name interval
  • Tracking Worker
  • PR Remote → Get (something)
  • If interval changed → Cancel unqueue work → Enqueue magic work

Development Notes

Current Status: “Hmm… Feeling good”

TODO:

  • Take code and spread it out

Query Logic:

  • Query if corresponds to a day
  • If daily → was it been >= 1 hour?
  • If daily → was it been >= 1 day?

Diagrams Present:

  1. System flow diagram showing connections between CPAM, server, and LED strip components
  2. Worker architecture diagram illustrating the relationship between scheduling and tracking workers
  3. Data flow boxes showing the interaction between shared preferences, workers, and remote services
  4. Hardware layout sketch showing EVEUS device with dimensions (appears to be 12x12 or 10x12)

The notes appear to be planning documentation for a mobile app that tracks app usage time and controls LED strips, with scheduled background workers handling data collection and synchronization.

item.title: ## App Development & Playtime Tracking System
item.content:

System Architecture Flow

Computer/Server → API → Property → LED Strip
↓
External connection

AllGZ?!?!?!

  • 10 x 12 dimensions

Errors (LED Strip Simulator?)

  • Issue: Handwriting
  • D.C → Upload Issues

Internal settings:

  • “daily” / “hourly”
  • Package_name = ""

Component Structure

AppPlayTime ScheduledWorkers

  • AppPlayTimeTrackingWorker

Scheduled Worker (run every hour)

  • Pull tracking worker scheduling/config
  • If config interval changed
  • CancelUniqueWork(“PR AppPlaytime Tracker”) + EnqueueUniqueWork

Events Amplitude

  • Y2 3,4

Corn Rate w/ Ham Surface

PR Remote (get SQL conn)

Stored Prefs

  • interval
  • package_name
  • get package name from interval

Scheduled Worker

  • if interval changed → CancelUniqueWork, EnqueueUniqueWork

AppPlayTimeTrackingWorker

  • Every 5 minutes
  • Run on interval (2min)
  • Only query for this every 8-12 days

Current Status

“Hmm… Feeling good”

Action Items

  • Take CPE then spread it out

Queries & Timeframes

  • Query # corresponds to 6
  • if daily → has it been 1+ hour?
  • if daily → has it been 1+ day?

Diagrams Present:

  1. System Flow Diagram: Shows connection from Computer/Server through API to Property and LED Strip with external connection
  2. Component Architecture: Multiple connected boxes showing the relationship between different workers, stored preferences, and tracking components
  3. Checkbox: One completed checkbox indicating a finished task
